# ğŸ¨ Favicon Generator

A free, fast, and easy-to-use online tool to generate all required favicon formats from any image.

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ“ Upload any image (PNG, JPG, SVG)
- ğŸ”„ Generates all required sizes automatically
- ğŸ“¦ Downloads all files instantly
- ğŸ“ Provides ready-to-use HTML code
- ğŸ¨ Clean, modern UI
- ğŸ“± Fully responsive
- ğŸš€ No server required - runs entirely in the browser

## ğŸ–¼ï¸ Generated Files

- `favicon-16x16.png` - Standard favicon
- `favicon-32x32.png` - Standard favicon
- `apple-touch-icon.png` - iOS devices
- `android-chrome-192x192.png` - Android devices
- `android-chrome-512x512.png` - High-res Android
- `site.webmanifest` - PWA manifest

## ğŸš€ Usage

1. Visit the live tool at [GitHub Pages URL]
2. Click "Choose Image" and select your logo
3. Click "Generate Favicons"
4. All files download automatically
5. Copy the provided HTML code
6. Add the HTML code to your website's `<head>` section
7. Upload the favicon files to your website root
8. Hard refresh (Ctrl+Shift+R) to see your new favicon!

## ğŸ’» Run Locally

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/MainTez/Favicon-generator.git

# Navigate to the directory
cd Favicon-generator

# Open in browser
# Just open index.html in your browser - no build step required!
```

## ğŸŒ Deploy to GitHub Pages

This project is configured to automatically deploy to GitHub Pages. To enable deployment:

1. Go to repository Settings â†’ Pages
2. Under "Source", select "GitHub Actions"
3. Push to the `main` branch to trigger deployment
4. Your site will be available at `https://[username].github.io/Favicon-generator/`
